```{r setup, include=TRUE, message=FALSE} 
library(hexSticker)

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

You can make awesome hex stickers for your R packages using [hexSticker](https://github.com/GuangchuangYu/hexSticker). 

# scKirby

[Original image credit](https://i.redd.it/4um5onzwssl21.jpg)

```{r, eval=F}   
img1 <- here::here("inst/hex/buff_kirby.jpeg")

hex <- hexSticker::sticker(subplot = img1, 
                    package="scKirby", p_color="black", p_size=20,
                    s_x = 1, s_y = .8,  s_width = .5, s_height = .5, 
                    h_fill = "white", h_color = "#eb6ebd", spotlight = FALSE,
                    filename = here::here("inst/hex/scKirby.png"))
print(hex)
```
